version_description:
* Option to turn off audio streaming and recording to clips
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements

* Option to send video clip feedback
* Ability to set Alexa notification frequency
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements

* Option to delete multiple or all recorded clips.
* Improved experience for enabling or disabling audio playing in your clips and live view.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.

* Option to add schedules to turn your camera on and off.
* Added app version number in the camera details page.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.

* Option to disable recording by setting motion sensitivity to zero.
* Enhanced Home/Away setting to display the status of your mobile devices, whether they are at home or away.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.

* Option to use your app to remotely disable Home/Away if you have multiple Home/Away enabled devices
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements

* Options to receive Smart Alerts for audio events detected by your Cloud Cam (Cloud Cam subscription plan required).
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements.
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements
* Bug fixes and general performance improvements
